page.title: 14LOCHGOILHEAD-CLUBS
page.content: The inhabitants of Lochgoilhead have no time to weary.There are clubs run, by the villagers themselves,to suit most tastes and all ages.The Village Hall is the hub of the activity as many of the clubs are held there. Specifically for the children there are the{youth clubs,}junior and senior,and the{Playgroup}for the very young.Many of the clubs are open to all ages or run a special junior section.i.e.{Carpet Bowls & Badminton. Those open to all are{Country Dancing, {Whist,Watersports and the Gun and {Rifle Club.}The{Curling Club}is the farthest travelled;the nearest rink is in Glasgow.Other clubs in the village are the{Burns Club,Women's Guild, {Women's Rural and the Ladies Keep Fit. Mr Prescott runs the{World Wild Life {Fund.}If all this was not enough some people attend clubs held elsewhere.
